text: John Christopher Depp II (born June 9, 1963) is an American actor, producer, musician and painter. He is the recipient of multiple accolades, including a Golden Globe Award and a Screen Actors Guild Award, in addition to nominations for three Academy Awards and two BAFTAs.
author: Ilaria Refaat

text: EGYPT PROJECTS is the number one leading show in the building industry in Africa.  All the decision-makers meet the contractors to choose their partners and find products/services for the buildings of today & tomorrow.
author: Ilaria ghobrial messiha

text: Egypt has been known to mainly depend, in all its energy-related activities, on three major sources: oil, natural gas and the hydroelectric power generated from the large dam projects over the Nile:
author: Zeinab lolo
